Calculate Distance Matrix

Source: R/getDistMat.R
getDistMat.Rd

discription

getDistMat(
  seu_list,
  verbose = TRUE,
  tmp.initial.clusters = "seurat_clusters",
  method = "trend",
  additional.variate = NULL,
  downsampling.size = 35,
  downsampling.include = TRUE,
  downsampling.replace = TRUE
)

Arguments

seu_list

seu list
verbose

print the message and progress bar (default: TRUE)
tmp.initial.clusters

tmp.initial.clusters
method

voom or trend
additional.variate

additional variate to include into the regression model
downsampling.size

downsampling.size
downsampling.include

downsampling.include
downsampling.replace

downsampling.replace

Value

a distance matrix

Author

Zhiyuan Hu
